TASK: Adjust volume to 50%
DOMAIN: media

STEPS:
1. Click on the system tray volume icon in the taskbar
   REASONING: Access the volume control interface to adjust the system volume level
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.95, y=0.98)

2. Wait for volume slider to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the volume control popup to fully render before interacting with it
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

3. Click on the volume slider at the 50% position
   REASONING: Set the volume to exactly 50% by clicking at the midpoint of the volume slider
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.93, y=0.75)

4. Verify the volume level displays 50%
   REASONING: Ensure the volume has been successfully adjusted to the target level before completing the task
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

5. Click outside the volume popup to close it
   REASONING: Dismiss the volume control interface to return to normal desktop view
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.5)

6. Task completed
   REASONING: Volume has been successfully adjusted to 50%
   ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The system volume should be set to 50%, visible both in the volume slider position and the numerical percentage display. The volume icon in the system tray should reflect a medium volume level, and any media playing should now play at 50% of maximum volume.
